entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
